SELECT A.iproduct, M.imiddle, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_middle_category M ON A.candidate_key = M.candidate_key LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct
A.del_fl = 0 and
(M.imiddle = #{cat.imiddle} and M.imain = #{cat.imain})
1=1 AND A.product_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND A.price >= #{minPrice} AND A.price <=#{maxPrice} AND 1=1 AND A.price <= #{maxPrice} AND A.price >= #{minPrice}
GROUP BY A.iproduct ORDER BY
A.created_at DESC A.price DESC A.price ASC
LIMIT #{startIdx},#{rowCount}

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct WHERE A.rc_fl = 1 AND A.del_fl = 0 GROUP BY A.iproduct

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_user_child UC ON A.recommand_age = UC.ichild_age

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.rep_pic, A.price, B.product_cnt, A.price * B.product_cnt AS totalPrice FROM t_product A JOIN t_basket B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct JOIN t_user C ON C.iuser = B.iuser WHERE B.iuser = #{iuser}
SELECT COUNT(ireview) AS reviewCnt , AVG(product_score) AS avgProductScore FROM t_review WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}
